articles.title: Falcons' James Pearce Jr. arrested in Florida on battery charges - ESPN
articles.description: Falcons linebacker James Pearce Jr., who finished third in Defensive Rookie of the Year voting, was arrested after police said he fled a domestic dispute and crashed his vehicle during a police chase.

articles.description: The “Quadgod” wants to pace himself, but his slow start means the U.S. will have a fight to win the team gold.

articles.description: “Just because I’m wearing the flag doesn’t mean I represent everything that’s going on in the U.S.,” says freestyle skier Hunter Hess.

articles.title: Milan: Protest ends in clashes near Olympic Village - dw.com
articles.description: Police used tear gas and water cannons on dozens of protesters near the Olympic Village in Milan. Protesters were demonstrating over the environmental impact of the games and also the presence of US ICE agents.
